timeline.message: test if timeout propagates to OkHttp

timeline.bodyText: This does not run agains graphhopper.com? do we need the parameterization here?
timeline.author: easbar

replies.bodyText: Ok, we would need it for GET and POST but the maxUnzippedLength is indeed misleading and not required.
replies.author: karussell

replies.bodyText: (to test that it is applied to OkHttp for POST and GET)
replies.author: karussell
easbar

replies.bodyText: Thanks, will use this as this is perfect here as I have to create it only once :)
replies.author: karussell

replies.bodyText: Btw: there is no BooleanSource ... it is done via @ValueSource(booleans = {true, false}) it seems.
replies.author: karussell

timeline.message: make test a bit shorter via ValueSource
